creator: amtripat@cisco.com
text:
When we use isapi_redirect.dll(Tomcat3.1.1) we face the problem of 100% CPU 
utilization in the machines having 2 CPUs.

But when we use Tomcat3.2.3 , we dont face this problem.

My question is that, is this a bug in Tomcat3.1.1 that has been fixed in 
Tomcat3.2.3 ? If not why is this differenecc in behaviour in the two versions
of Tomcat.

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
Yes, it sounds like a bug in 3.1.1 that was fixed in 3.2.x.  What changed?  I 
don't know.  If you're really interested you can check the CVS change logs.  
I'd just switch to Tomcat 3.2.3.
